description: This file defines a utility class 'ApiRequestContextHolder' that manages per-request context data using ThreadLocal storage in a Java web application. It provides methods to get or create the context and to clear it.

classes.name: ApiRequestContextHolder
classes.description: A utility class providing thread-local storage for ApiRequestContext objects, ensuring each thread handles its own request-specific data in a thread-safe manner.

methods.name: clearContext
methods.description: Removes the ApiRequestContext associated with the current thread, clearing the stored request data.

methods.name: getContext
methods.description: Retrieves the ApiRequestContext for the current thread, creating a new one if it does not exist, and logs this creation.
